bibl.title: P. Fordham inv. 5: A Ptolemaic Petition to the Archidikastes.
bibl.note: A condensed version of the article was presented at the 26th International Congress of Papyrology in Geneva (August 21, 2010). - P. Fordham Inv. 5 (Fordham University Library, Bronx, NY). Petition to the archidikastes. Provenance unknown, middle of the second century BCE.
CLAYTOR W. Graham, P. Fordham inv. 5: A Ptolemaic Petition to the Archidikastes.
